Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class Halia::ArrList< T >

A list using contiguous memory.

A list using a contiguous block of memory allowing for quick insertion and deletion from the end of the list and fast iteration. Also allows for passing a pointer to the base memory to functions not under your control.
